channel.title: Things You Don't Need to Know with Ari Cagan
channel.description: Defusing a bomb, landing an airplane, performing open heart surgery… very few people in the world need instructions on topics like these. Luckily Ari Cagan is here to talk to the few experts in these fields and then teach you everything you’ll never need to know.

image.title: Things You Don't Need to Know with Ari Cagan

channel.itunes:author: Ari Cagan & HyperObject Industries/Three Uncanny Four

item.title: Coming Soon: Things You Don't Need to Know
item.description:
Defusing a bomb, repossessing an airplane, taking over the world… very few people need detailed instructions on topics like these. But Ari Cagan, self-taught ambassador of useless information, is contractually obligated to explain them to you anyway.
"Things You Don't Need to Know" is a new podcast hosted by Ari Cagan from HyperObject Industries and Three Uncanny Four Productions. New episodes starting February 18th. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.content:encoded:
Defusing a bomb, repossessing an airplane, taking over the world… very few people need detailed instructions on topics like these. But Ari Cagan, self-taught ambassador of useless information, is contractually obligated to explain them to you anyway. 


"Things You Don't Need to Know" is a new podcast hosted by Ari Cagan from HyperObject Industries and Three Uncanny Four Productions. New episodes starting February 18th. 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
